segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see a 'COOKIE JAR' inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's definitely taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing nearby, reaching out her hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilted back, almost like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried he might fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What daring little rascals they are!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem totally engrossed in their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could go very wrong in a second.
segments.speaker: PAR
